CARDINAL . The relevant legislation is outlined in the ORG ’s judgment in PERSON and GPE ( [ ORG ] , no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , ORG CARDINAL-VII ) . Those and further provisions of particular relevance to the present case are described below .
